text:
Hey <@U01121W33EJ>. Took a look. Needs an overhaul IMO. Lede is either buried or convoluted—I didn't really know what I was reading about at all.

I mean, if I scrutinize and make educated guesses, I can figure it out, but you don't want to put your Reader through that exercise. Strongly suggest finding the core SO WHAT, phrasing it in a short, declarative sentence (or two), and making sure that it is one of the first things that you read.

Details and whatnot can flow from there. (aka Inverted Pyramid approach).
